prompt: Are there currently any free audio to text transcription services?

hidden_queries: free audio to text transcription services current
best free audio transcription tools no cost audio to text

citation_mappings.claim_text: Yes — there are free audio-to-text transcription services available now, but they vary in limits and ease of use. Descript+2FreeScribe+2

sources.title: Free Audio to Text Converter - Transcribe Audio Online | AudioToText.com
sources.snippet: Why Choose AudioToText.com for Audio Transcription? The most powerful free AI transcription service that converts speech to text with professional accuracy and lightning speed.

citation_mappings.claim_text: Truly free (no signup/limits, basic): AudioToText.com – upload audio/video and get a free transcript, no account required. AudioToText
FreeScribe – unlimited free audio-to-text transcription without logging in (file size limits apply). FreeScribe
Scribewave Free – free online transcription up to certain file size (e.g., 30 MB) with no credit card needed. Scribewave
Cliptics – free speech-to-text converter with no registration; daily use limits may reset. Cliptics
Free tiers with useful features (but may require signup/limits): Otter.ai – free plan includes some transcription minutes each month and features like searchable/editable text. Otter.ai

sources.snippet: Free Audio to Text Converter - Transcribe audio in 120+ languages with 99% accuracy. No credit card needed. Try HappyScribe free now.

citation_mappings.claim_text: Happy Scribe – free transcription available; may require account and has caps. HappyScribe

sources.snippet: 6 free audio-to-text converters compared 1. Descript Best for: Transcribing any video or audio file accurately on a computer. Descript offers automated transcription for audio and video files through its Mac, Windows, and browser-based editor. Simply drag and drop your audio files to convert them into text within seconds.

sources.snippet: Unlimited minutes. Say goodbye to errors: Our AI transcription service boasts near-perfect accuracy. The only unlimited transcription service on Earth. No caps or quotas. Verbatim audio to text. Transcribe audio and video in seconds, not days. Generate subtitles and transcripts automatically. Start transcribing for free. Upload audio and video ...
